title: Dapper on Congo religion - authors purpose

content.question: Which of the following describes the most likely purpose of this source?

choices.label: To promote Christianity throughout the African diaspora
To describe the culture of Africa to a European audience
To encourage religious tolerance among Europeans in Africa
To report on economic development in Africa to African leaders

content.answer: To describe the culture of Africa to a European audience

skill.text: 2.B: Describe a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
